Text: RElivid in ebonics mean pissed off throwed off off the hook When she shut the door was there a sailor speaking in the room Ha Ha Ha Original Message From mailto Sent Monday July PM To SSPCCOM Subject RE Everything is fine And its not just you that Im saying this to My supervisor made a big deal about me leaving early at pm on Friday for Candis Party When I walked into her office and reminded her that on Wednesday I had asked to get off an hour early she had just barely acknowledged that I was even in the room but before she could finish hearing me out good she spun around in her chair and said What time did you come in this morning Well the rest was history After about minutes she had to get up and shut the door because every comment that was made brought an even louder response Needless to say I was LIVID by the time I left out of there wan hour later Bobby Jackson SSPCCOM on PM To cc Subject RE Hey waz up How is your day going so far Lunch This new way is weighing heavily on my mind You wrote Im only going to communicate with you Bobby through email Whats really going on here Did it have anything to do with me I guess what Im really trying to say is You know what Im thinking Original Message From mailto Sent Monday July AM To SSPCCOM Subject RE Yes you told me that you saw us I blew up on someone my boss Im not ready to talk about it yet because it causes me to vividly relive the whole thing and Im just not ready to revisit that situation yet Although I can say this changes will be taking place because of this Im changing my hours for to TO to Im only going to communicate with you through email If you need something thats urgent you can leave me a message and I will respond via email or go to another phone and call you Yes its that serious Anyway not the end of the world just FYI Bobby Jackson SSPCCOM on AM To Dana Davis cc Subject RE Good morning to you also My weekend was very quiet You would have been proud of me I would have preferred it a different way Oh well The explosion in question is that the one at the refinery Or is it another one regarding you blowing up on somebody Oh yes did I say that I saw you and Kandace on Friday nite around pm Sorry I didnt drive today Funny I checked my voice mail most of the weekend the moment I didnt check I get a call Cya Original Message From Dana Davis mailto Sent Monday July AM To Subject Good Morning How was your weekend Evidently you didnt get my message before this morning and hopefully you got to work on time Well because of the explosion that accured Friday dont call me Ill call you you are ringing my phone now Did you drive

REmannnn It seemed like a lot of stuff hit the fan on Friday Not only there but here also It didnt hit me initially but I got caught in some of the backlash I hope that your job is NOT in jeopardy As for the changes I can go along with one of them Guess which The pm Ill definitely be changing to get off at pm or earlier Oh watch your ego Its not all you I got a letter from Brians Football team They have an equipment check Saturday July and practice starts that Monday at pm Being an Assistant Coach you know the drill As for this other nonsense about phone callemail If it aint bad enough that thingsOh well Do you feel me Anyway not knowing the full extent what and why it happened Your Blow Up and my ever evolving situation with a new twist I think Ive said enough for now Original Message REmannnn It seemed like a lot of stuff hit the fan on Friday Not only there but here also It didnt hit me initially but I got caught in some of the backlash I hope that your job is NOT in jeopardy As for the changes I can go along with one of them Guess which The pm Ill definitely be changing to get off at pm or earlier Oh watch your ego Its not all you I got a letter from Brians Football team They have an equipment check Saturday July and practice starts that Monday at pm Being an Assistant Coach you know the drill As for this other nonsense about phone callemail If it aint bad enough that thingsOh well Do you feel me Anyway not knowing the full extent what and why it happened Your Blow Up and my ever evolving situation with a new twist I think Ive said enough for now Original Message through email If you need something thats urgent you can leave me a message and I will respond via email or go to another phone and call you Yes its that serious Anyway not the end of the world just FYI Bobby Jackson SSPCCOM on AM To Dana Davis cc Subject RE Good morning to you also My weekend was very quiet You would have been proud of me I would have preferred it a different way Oh well The explosion in question is that the one at the refinery Or is it another one regarding you blowing up on somebody Oh yes did I say that I saw you and Kandace on Friday nite around pm Sorry I didnt drive today Funny I checked my voice mail most of the weekend the moment I didnt check I get a call Cya Original Message From Dana Davis mailto Sent Monday July AM To Subject Good Morning How was your weekend Evidently you didnt get my message before this morning and hopefully you got to work on time Well because of the explosion that accured Friday dont call me Ill call you you are ringing my phone now Did you drive
